name: Broken Hearts (Zapturk)
description:
Play as 2 pieces of a single heart trying to join itself back together.

- Controls -

  • Jump/Start game - Space
  • Movement - Left and Right Arrow
  • Switch Heart Half - X (Only on some levels)
  • Reset Room - R

This was made for GMTK Game Jame 2021. I learned a lot and had a ton of fun.
